forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 43F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Snow showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon hours. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon hours. High 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered flurries and snow showers. High near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low 26F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.
